data: Experienced programmer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry.
Uses TypeScript, React and Redux in development. Good understanding of CI/CD, unit testing and code review processes.
Also familiar with Back-End development (Java, Node JS). Advanced Linux user.
Considerable experience with various roles as team lead, integrator, developer.
Also skilled in usage of version control systems such as Git or Mercurial and task trackers like Jira.
Strong engineering professional with a Engineer's degree focused in Applied Informatics in Economics from Rybinsk State Aviation Technological Academy named after P. A. Solovyov.
Born in Rybinsk, a small city on the banks of river Volga. The city is located in 300 kilometers northeast of Moscow.
Interested in adventures and fantasy books and movies. Fond of music of different genres such as Rock, Jazz and Blues.
Amateur sportsman playing Soccer and Basketball. Also likes cycling and swimming.
